column2: we instantly felt overwhelmed by the menu.  My boyfriend's roommate had recommended the 10-course tasting menu and we thought it would be a fun way to try out everything and step outside our comfort zones.  Our waiter (who was great
column3: by the way) was very helpful and told us that the 10-course tasting menu typically samples from the daily specials.  Since it was our first time and he wanted us to try their classic dishes from the regular menu
column4: he specially designed our own 10-course menu to try a mix of not only the specials
column5: but their most popular regular dishes as well.
